title: Web Development
desc: Building responsive and performant web applications using modern stacks like React, Next.js, and Node.js.
details: I specialize in creating dynamic user interfaces with React and leveraging Next.js for server-side rendering, static site generation, and optimized performance. My backend expertise includes building robust APIs with Node.js and Express, connecting to databases like MongoDB or PostgreSQL. I focus on clean code, maintainability, and excellent user experience.

title: Mobile App Development
desc: Developing cross-platform mobile applications for Android & iOS using Flutter and Dart.
details: With Flutter, I build beautiful, natively compiled applications for mobile from a single codebase. I handle state management, API integration, and create smooth, engaging user interfaces following platform best practices. Experienced in developing features from scratch and maintaining existing applications.

title: IoT & Embedded Systems
desc: Designing and programming microcontroller-based systems (ESP32, Arduino) for IoT solutions and automation.
details: I have hands-on experience in developing IoT solutions, from selecting appropriate sensors and microcontrollers (like ESP32 and Arduino families) to writing firmware using Arduino C++ or MicroPython. I integrate devices with cloud platforms using protocols like MQTT, manage data streams, and build control systems for automation projects like Smart Homes or Smart Farming.
